Emilio Nsue missed a penalty for Equatorial Guinea after a lengthy VAR check.
Federico Bikoro was shown a red card for a high-footed challenge on Mohamed Bayo.
Equatorial Guinea missed a penalty after Iban Salvador was fouled in the penalty area.
Federico Bikoro of Equatorial Guinea was sent off in the 55th minute for a high-foot tackle on Mohamed Bayo.
Mohamed Bayo scored a last-minute goal in the eighth minute of stoppage time to secure a 1-0 victory for Guinea.
Emilio Nsue of Equatorial Guinea missed a penalty opportunity in the 69th minute, hitting the right post with a right-footed shot.
Equatorial Guinea’s Féderico Bikoro was shown a red card in the 55th minute, leaving Equatorial Guinea at a numerical disadvantage.
Guinea’s Mohamed Bayo scored the winning goal with a header from the center of the box to the bottom right corner, assisted by Ibrahim Diakite.
Mohamed Bayo scored a last-gasp winner to send Guinea into the last eight of the Africa Cup of Nations with a 1-0 win over 10-man Equatorial Guinea.
